title: California unbans the use of electric skateboards in bike lanes
text:
California unbans the use of electric skateboards in bike lanes 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
In 1977, California banned the use of powered skateboards on state streets; largely because the only reliable source of power back then was ...
